website_summaries.verdict: While this chaise lounge stands out for its interesting appearance, it's not the most stable option and won't work for everyone.
pros: Boasts a simple design with a curved structure that fits your body's natural contours for notable comfort
Soft material has a stylish tufted pattern
cons: Construction doesn't feel as durable as other models we considered

customer_reviews.title: We love this piece
customer_reviews.text: We love this piece! It’s slightly smaller than we envisioned, but fits perfect in our master bedroom reading nook, and it’s just beautiful. We love the color, the material, and the comfort for reading, and it feels like a strong value for the price. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chaise is dope!!!!! It looks beautiful. Easy to assemble. It's very low to the ground, not a problem for me but you need to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: zen tiger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chaise lounge but it's more of a decor than a chair that you can use, pretty fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Robinhood

customer_reviews.title: Its as cute as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Color is exactly the same as pictured. Easy to assemble. Very great addition, seems very sturdy. Because of the velvet I cant prop my feet up because they slide, so does my body. Not an extremely cushiony comfortable piece (didnt expect it to be) but the cuteness makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanetria Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this chaise, sleek and cool! I keep it in my office! I got it on sale wouldn’t pay more than $200 for it, but it’s so cute!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable or sturdy but it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable or sturdy but it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Anita N.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any room
customer_reviews.text: Great price, blue color looks amazing. It was easy to assemble. Comfort is ok, not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Karloz Veraztegui

customer_reviews.title: Me encanta!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! The color is rich , just what I needed for my living room. My dog loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Gflores

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a MASSIVE hit for a Christmas gift, it is quite low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: F. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. But design is not comfort. And its not sturdy as well. But i gave three because it looks good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: suresh

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Garret Velvet Chaise Lounge, Cobalt Grey / Dark Brown
product_meta.description: This indoor chaise lounge Is the ideal choice for buyers looking to create a one-person relaxation nook in their home. Featuring an elegant tufted body, This chair is curved to provide the most comfortable shape for the human body. Made from the highest-quality materials, This is a purchase that will provide years of comfort and relaxation.
feature_bullets: This indoor Chaise lounge is the ideal choice for buyers looking to create a one-person relaxation nook in their home. Featuring an elegant Tufted body, this chair is curved to provide the most comfortable shape for the human body. Made from the highest-quality materials, this is a purchase that will provide years of comfort and relaxation
